mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_ba_temp_note( id, name, activity_id, status, send_sms, sms_content, priority, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{activityId.id}, #{status}, #{sendSms}, #{smsContent}, #{priority}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ba_temp_note SET name = #{name}, activity_id = #{activityId.id}, status = #{status}, send_sms = #{sendSms}, sms_content = #{smsContent}, priority = #{priority}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
